name.jp: アルティマーヒーローマント

description.en: An exquisite cloak, given to the those who achieved glorious victory at the Tournament of Champions II in January 2010 and to some lucky Madrigalians.Gives all stats +10 and HP max +10%.
description.ar: An exquisite cloak, given to the those who achieved glorious victory at the Tournament of Champions II in January 2010 and to some lucky Madrigalians.Gives all stats +10 and HP max +10%.
description.br: Um manto requintado, dado àqueles que alcançaram a vitória gloriosa no Torneio dos Campeões II em janeiro de 2010 e a alguns Madrigalianos sortudos.
description.cns: 一件精致的披风，送给那些在2010年1月的冠军II锦标赛中取得辉煌胜利的人和一些幸运的马德里人。给出所有统计数据+10和HP max +10%。
description.de: Ein besonderer Cloak für Helden Madrigals und jene, welche besonderes Glück hatten!
description.fi: An exquisite cloak, given to the those who achieved glorious victory at the Tournament of Champions II in January 2010 and to some lucky Madrigalians.Gives all stats +10 and HP max +10%.
description.fil: An exquisite cloak, given to the those who achieved glorious victory at the Tournament of Champions II in January 2010 and to some lucky Madrigalians.Gives all stats +10 and HP max +10%.
description.fr: Cape décernée aux héros de Madrigal ainsi qu'aux plus chanceux ! Augmente toutes les statistiques de base de 10 et octroie 10% de Points de Vie max.
description.id: Cloak yang sangat indah, diberikan kepada mereka yang mencapai kemenangan gemilang di Tournament of Champions II pada Januari 2010 dan untuk beberapa madrigalian yang beruntung.Memberikan all stats +10 dan HP max +10%.
description.it: An exquisite cloak, given to the those who achieved glorious victory at the Tournament of Champions II in January 2010 and to some lucky Madrigalians.Gives all stats +10 and HP max +10%.
description.jp: 2010年1月のトーナメントオブチャンピオンズIIで輝かしい勝利を収めた人々と幸運なマドリガリアンに与えられる絶妙なマント。すべてのステータス+10、最大HP+ 10％。
description.kr: 2010 년 1 월 챔피언스 II 토너먼트에서 영광스러운 승리를 거둔 사람들과 행운의 마드리갈 리안에게 주어지는 절묘한 망토로 모든 능력치 +10 및 HP 최대 + 10 %를 제공합니다.
description.nl: An exquisite cloak, given to the those who achieved glorious victory at the Tournament of Champions II in January 2010 and to some lucky Madrigalians.Gives all stats +10 and HP max +10%.
description.pl: An exquisite cloak, given to the those who achieved glorious victory at the Tournament of Champions II in January 2010 and to some lucky Madrigalians.Gives all stats +10 and HP max +10%.
description.ru: An exquisite cloak, given to the those who achieved glorious victory at the Tournament of Champions II in January 2010 and to some lucky Madrigalians.Gives all stats +10 and HP max +10%.
description.sp: Una capa exquisita, otorgada a aquellos que lograron una gloriosa victoria en el Torneo de Campeones II en enero de 2010 y a algunos Madrigalianos afortunados. Otorga todas las estadísticas +10 y HP máximo +10%.
description.sw: An exquisite cloak, given to the those who achieved glorious victory at the Tournament of Champions II in January 2010 and to some lucky Madrigalians.Gives all stats +10 and HP max +10%.
description.th: เสื้อคลุมอันวิจิตรตระการตา มอบให้กับผู้ที่ได้รับชัยชนะอันรุ่งโรจน์ในการแข่งขัน Tournament of Champions II ในเดือนมกราคม 2010 และแก่ Madrigalians ที่โชคดีบางคน มอบสถานะทั้งหมด +10 และ HP สูงสุด +10%
description.tw: 象徵勝利的斗篷，全能力+10和HP+10%
description.vi: Một chiếc áo choàng tinh tế, được trao cho những người đã đạt được chiến thắng vẻ vang tại Tournament of Champions II vào tháng 1 năm 2010 và cho một số người Madrigal may mắn. Cho tất cả các chỉ số +10 và HP tối đa + 10%.
